scripts.init: pnpm run init:delete && pnpm run build:lib && pnpm run build && pnpm run link && node script/hello.mjs && pnpm run build:w
scripts.build:update: pnpm run build:public && pnpm run build:ts
scripts.build:public: node script/delete_nottype.mjs -dist/public && node public/config.mjs && node script/copy_dist.mjs -public
scripts.build:lib: pnpm run lib:gc && pnpm run lib:game && pnpm run lib:index
scripts.lib:gc: node script/copy_lib.mjs -GameCreatorLib -/dist/gc && node script/build_lib.mjs -/dist/gc -/type/api.d.ts && node script/delete_nottype.mjs -lib/dist/gc
scripts.lib:game: node script/copy_lib.mjs -Game -/tmp/game && tsc -p ./lib/tsconfig.json && node script/build_lib.mjs -/dist/game -/type/game.d.ts && node script/delete_folder.mjs -/lib/tmp
